content: combine spellbinding design with cozy comfort to create this graphic crochet blanket that adds moody flair to any space stitched in red heart super saver jumbo the pattern looks bold as designed but any contrasting shades would work well for a similar effect practice joining motifs single_crochet double_crochet and treble_crochet techniques we created this one for halloween but the pattern is versatile for any event or season materials red heart® super saver jumbo™ 14 oz/396 g 744 yds/681 m contrast a soft white 0316 2 balls or 1394 yds/1269 m contrast b black 0312 2 balls or 1394 yds/1269 m contrast c amethyst 0356 1 ball or 190 yds/173 m measurements approx 55 139 5 cm x 63 160 cm gauge motif = 7½ 19 cm square
